div.t-att-class: 'img_lbl %s' % product.product_style_tag_id.color if product and product.product_style_tag_id else 'img_lbl'

label.t-attf-style: background-color:#{value_id.html_color or value_id.name if not value_id.is_custom else ''}
label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{'' if first_possible_combination[variant_id_index] == value_id else ''} #{'custom_value' if value_id.is_custom else ''}

div.t-att-class: 'img_lbl %s' % product.product_style_tag_id.color if product and product.product_style_tag_id else 'img_lbl'

div.p:
